forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. North northwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. North northeast wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible

Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to a widespread power outage. Following the storm we will have some major tree debris to clean-up. 

Please check back to our website in the morning for an update on when we will be able to open.

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
